content:
This seems to work:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<kml xmlns="http://earth.google.com/kml/2.1">
<Placemark>
<name>2007:07:21 17:40:38</name>
<description>
<![CDATA[<img src="http://farm2.static.flickr.com/1066/866523067_9185030f90.jpg?v=0" >]]>
</description>
<Point>
<coordinates>-122.262,47.7355</coordinates>
</Point>
</Placemark>
</kml>

You'll have to get all the urls for the flickr images yourself, though...
